features: ✔ Vases for Decor✔ - This Set of 3 White Vases Makes the Perfect Home Decor Accent for any Setting. Great for Home Decor, Bedroom Decor, Living Room Decor, Office Decor, Desk Decor, Coffee Table Decor, and Shelf Decor.

✔ 65 PCS Pampas Grass Included✔ - With a Total 65 PCS and 5 Styles of Dried Pampass Grass Flowers Included, You Can Mix and Match Which Style Suits Your Vases the Best. To Increase Fluffiness Place Grass in Sunlight for 3 to 5 Hours. 65 PCS Contains 20x Reed, 15x Natural Bunny Tails, 15x White Bunny Tails, 10x Natural Pampas, and 5x White Pampas.
✔ Versatile and High Quality✔ - Our Modern Boho Style Vases are Compatible with any Types of Dried Flowers and are Made up of High Quality Ceramic Material Built to Last for Years.

✔ Vase and Dried Pampas Grass Sizes✔ - These Cute and Decorative Vases Come in 3 Different Sizes. Largest Size is 7.5"L x 7.7"H. Middle Size is 6.3"L x 6.8"H. Smallest Size is 5.4"L x 5.6"H. Each Pampas Grass Size is around 10"-11".

✔ Perfect Gift for Any Occasion✔ - Want to Find a Quality Gift for an Affordable Price? Choose VELOVA. This Entire Set Makes the Perfect Gifts for Women, Gifts for Mom, Gifts for Her, Housewarming Gift, Christmas Gift, or Home Decor Gift.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Set of 3 Round White Ceramic Vases Elevate your home decor with this VELOVA set of 3 white round ceramic vase. Crafted with precision and care, these vases blend timeless elegance with contemporary simplicity, making them the perfect addition to any room in your home. These aesthetic boho modern vases are sure to enhance the aesthetic of any decor in your home, adding a touch of sophistication and versatility to your interior decor. With 3 different sizes in this vase set, you can create a captivating visual display that captures the eye. Largest Size is 7.5"L x 7.7"H. Middle Size is 6.3"L x 6.8"H. Smallest Size is 5.4"L x 5.6"H.

65 PCS 5 Styles Dried Pampas Grass These 65 PCS of dried pampas grass will undoubtedly add a touch of natural beauty and boho elegance to your home decor, allowing you to create a soothing and stylish atmosphere in your living space. Pampas grass is known for its ability to bring a feeling of calm and tranquility to any environment, making it a popular choice for interior decoration. Pampas grass make an ideal choice for an array of interior aesthetics, from boho and modern. With this set of 65 PCS and 5 different styles, you have the freedom to explore your creativity and style, making it easy to transform your living space into a haven of natural beauty. 65 PCS dried pampas grass contains 20x Reed, 15x Natural Bunny Tails, 15x White Bunny Tails, 10x Natural Pampas, and 5x White Pampas. To increase fluffiness place grass in sunlight for 3 to 5 hours.

Perfect for your Bedroom Decor. Transform your bedroom into a modern boho haven with this set of 3 round white vases and 65 PCS dried pampas grass. The timeless cute white ceramic vases, with their minimalist design, effortlessly blend into your cute room decor, providing a sleek, modern aesthetic. When combined with the natural allure of the pampas grass, your bedroom decor transforms into a serene oasis, where boho-chic and modern aesthetics seamlessly merge. This home decor accent invites a sense of calm and style into your bedroom living space.

Enhance your Living Room Coffee Table Decor Your small round white vases will exude timeless elegance on your living room coffee table, creating a visually striking centerpiece with their clean and modern design. VELOVA vases and dried pampas grass set adds a touch of sophistication, while their simplicity complements various decor styles, making them a versatile choice for any aesthetic. VELOVA will effortlessly enhance your living room, bringing an air of refined beauty to your coffee table decor setting.

Brighten your Office Desk Decor The VELOVA set of 3 white vases and 65 PCS dried pampas grass is a versatile addition to your office desk setting. For a boho office desk decor, the vases offer a subtle yet elegant contrast, blending harmoniously with the bohemian aesthetic. In a modern office desk decor, their minimalist design and clean white finish create a contemporary and sleek look, adding a touch of sophistication to your workspace. Whether you aim for a boho or modern office decor, these vases will effortlessly elevate the aesthetic appeal of your office desk.

Perfect for your Shelf Decor The VELOVA vases make a stylish addition to both your living room and bedroom shelf.. In your living room, these vases add a modern touch to your shelf decor with their sleek and cute design. On a bedroom shelf, their minimalist design effortlessly blends with a boho aesthetic, infusing the space with a subtle yet charming elegance that complements the relaxed and eclectic atmosphere of the room.

Great Gift for any Occasion The VELOVA vases and pampas grass would make a wonderful gift for anyone due to their timeless beauty and versatile appeal. They provide an opportunity for the recipient to enhance their home decor with a touch of elegance, making it an ideal present for various occasions and personal tastes. This VELOVA vases and pampas grass set make a great: gifts for women, gifts for men, gifts for mom, gifts for dad, gifts for her, gifts for him, housewarming gift, wedding gift, home decor gift, christmas gift, birthday gifts for women, wedding gifts...etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It comes with many pampas grass and the vases are super cute & modern! Adds the perfect aesthetic touch to any room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This set is so pretty in person. It came with plenty of dried Pampas to make your own arrangement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute for a boho style room
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for a warm decor spruce up. Not overly large, perfect shelf sized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected! The vases and pampas grass are so cute and are high quality
reviews.reviewText: I totally got my money’s worth! At such a cheap price, i got so much. This set comes with 3 cute round vases and 65 pcs dried pampas grass. The vases were made of ceramic Andy’s great quality. My home decor looks so much better now. Will purchase these again for my office desk at work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like to decorate my apartment with these!
reviews.reviewText: I've been wanting to decorate my apartment for a while now, and I've had live/artificial flowers, vases, and other items to try out. I like the look of pampas grass, so I found these on Amazon. I originally got a pack with no pampas grass, but Amazon fixed that quickly. Once I got the package with the grass, I got to take a look at the quality. For the price, the three vases are pretty nice. I like that they're white and not colorful. I also like the amount of the grass that it came with. It's not the highest quality, but it's also not bad. I would say these are working out well in my apartment, and I might get another set for family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These come with a lot of pampas and the vases are good quality. Heavier and bigger than I expected, which is a plus. I ordered extra pampas just in case and I could have done without them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worth the price, i really love them and also liked that it comes with dried plants they just look lovely.
